ch0125_40_guzma/0101_0701_01_10:
Yo, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Did you come out
to break some things, too?
ch0125_40_guzma/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m gonna go all out today and smash everything
up like I always do!
ch0125_40_guzma/7101_0701_01_10: No matter what I’m wearing, I’ll never change!
ch0125_40_guzma/7101_0701_02_10:
I’m gonna break and smash and beat them
all down!
ch0125_40_guzma/7102_0701_01_10:
With this armor on, beating down anyone is
a piece of cake!
ch0125_40_guzma/7102_0701_02_10:
It might look like it’s hard to move around in all
this, but it’s not.
ch0125_40_guzma/7102_0701_03_10:
And that’s not all. It’s so tough that it hardly gets
a scratch, no matter what hits it.
ch0125_40_guzma/7103_0701_01_10:
The other day, I saw Buzzwole and Golisopod
together.
ch0125_40_guzma/7103_0701_02_10: Instead of attacking, they just flexed at each other!
ch0125_40_guzma/7103_0701_04_10:
I guess it doesn’t matter as long as they’re
having fun.
ch0125_40_guzma/7104_0701_01_10:
When you’re protecting your allies, digging in and
waiting around for the enemy isn’t the only way to
do it, you know.
ch0125_40_guzma/7104_0701_02_10:
The best defense is a good offense. You gotta
attack and attack and never let up!
ch0125_40_guzma/7104_0701_03_10:
That way, they won’t even have a chance to
attack you back! Now that’s what I call a strategy!
ch0125_40_guzma/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
When I’m with you, I feel like I could smash up
the whole world!
ch0125_40_guzma/7105_0701_02_10:
Whaddya say? Wanna come with me and break
some things?
ch0125_40_guzma/7105_0701_03_10:
When we go, I’ll even get you your own set
of matching armor!
ch0125_40_guzma/1701_0701_01_10: Here, take this. You’d better thank me for it!
ch0125_40_guzma/1701_0702_01_10:
Oh, and don’t even think about going wild and
smashing it, either!
ch0125_40_guzma/2501_0701_01_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I was just thinking about why Buzzwole does
those body-building poses.
ch0125_40_guzma/2501_0701_02_10: What do you think about it?
ch0125_40_guzma/2501_0701_03_10:
I’ve been thinking about it for hours, and it doesn’t
make any sense! I don’t get it!
ch0125_40_guzma/2501_0701_04_10:
I guess it’s just something that only Buzzwole
can understand.
ch0125_40_guzma/2501_0702_02_10:
You listen here. I was NOT imitating Buzzwole’s
body-building poses, OK?
ch0125_40_guzma/2511_0701_01_10:
You know that people call Buzzwole an
“Ultra Beast” and they get all scared of it, right?
ch0125_40_guzma/2511_0701_02_10:
Ugh. When I hear people say they think Buzzwole
is scary just because of how it looks, it really
bums me out.
ch0125_40_guzma/2511_0701_03_10:
Buzzwole hasn’t even done anything wrong...
At least not here on Pasio, anyway!
ch0125_40_guzma/2511_0702_01_10:
People judged me all the time on Alola even
though they didn’t know me.
ch0125_40_guzma/2511_0702_02_10:
Now that I’m here on Pasio, though, I’ve left that
all behind and I’m just livin’ it up.
ch0125_40_guzma/2511_0702_03_10:
That’s why I tell Buzzwole to ignore the haters and
just enjoy the battles here on Pasio.
ch0125_40_guzma/3001_0701_01_10:
What? I’m just givin’ the turf a quick once-over...
Guess it’s become a habit.
ch0125_40_guzma/3003_0701_01_10:
Me ’n’ my Pokémon gotta keep training our bodies
each day so punks like you can’t beat us down!
ch0125_40_guzma/3005_0701_01_10:
Ain’t it past your bedtime, kid?
Get outta here—unless you want a beatdown.
